statements.statement: DELETE /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/cmnTblOpMg/dm06SrtmWdstRstHisPhsDatDelJob/Dm06SrtmWdstRstHisPhsDatDel/delSrtmWdstRstHis */ FROM INSTC.TBGCBDM06 /* GCB준실시간배포결과내역 */ WHERE 작업기준년월일 <= ${작업기준년월일} AND ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/cmnTblOpMg/dm06SrtmWdstRstHisPhsDatDelJob/Dm06SrtmWdstRstHisPhsDatDel/retvSrtmWdstRstHisNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N10 FROM INSTC.TBGCBDM06 A /* GCB준실시간배포결과내역 */ WHERE A.작업기준년월일 <= ${작업기준년월일}
